meta.title: Configure open source library
meta.description: Configure open source library in a django application

Input_data.description: Django settings file, where all the important attributes must be defined
Input_data.QA: A good settings file do not have hard coded values such as secret keys.

Input_data.type: Url of the open source library
Input_data.description: Url of the open source library, it can be a github link or a pypi link

Output_data.type: Django setting file, configured with the open source library
Output_data.description: Django setting file, configured with the open source library.
